trans-unit.source: Provides implicit <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> management for child messaging activities.
trans-unit.target: Gir implisitt <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"> </xref> administrasjon for underordnede meldingstjeneste aktiviteter.

trans-unit.source: The CorrelationScope activity maintains an implicit <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle> that is only visible to child activities.
trans-unit.target: CorrelationScope aktiviteten opprettholder en implisitt <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle>som bare er synlig for underordnede aktiviteter.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith%2A> property is set by the user, it will be used as the CorrelationScope implicit handle.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith%2A>angitt av brukeren, brukes som CorrelationScope implisitt håndtaket.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the case of nested CorrelationScope, children of the inner scope cannot access implicit handle of the outer scope.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det nestede CorrelationScope underordnede av det innerste området får ikke tilgang til implisitt referanse på ytre omfang.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity’s execution logic.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den aktiviteten kjøring logic.

trans-unit.source: Builds and validates a description of the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
trans-unit.target: Validerer en beskrivelse av for aktiviteten argumenter variabler, underordnede aktiviteter og aktiviteter representanter tar.

trans-unit.source: The activity’s metadata that encapsulates the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
trans-unit.target: Metadataene for aktiviteten som innkapsler for aktiviteten argumenter variabler, underordnede aktiviteter og aktiviteter representanter.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> used by the child messaging activities.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"> </xref> brukes av underordnet meldingstjeneste aktiviteter.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet under kjøring.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er angitt under kjøring en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>forårsakes.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The runtime uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> for correlation if it is present, otherwise the **CorrelatesWith** property of the messaging activity will be used.
trans-unit.target: Kjøretiden bruker den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A>for Korrelasjons hvis den finnes, eller den **CorrelatesWith** for meldingsinfrastruktur aktiviteten vil bli brukt.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both are absent, the ambient handle provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> or the workflow service is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis begge finnes, omkringliggende håndtaket leveres av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>eller Arbeidsflyttjenesten benyttes.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>

trans-unit.source: The correlation handle used by the child messaging activities.
trans-unit.target: Korrelasjons-referansen som brukes av underordnet meldingstjeneste aktiviteter.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to execute the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope"></xref> activity.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av kjøretiden arbeidsflyten til å utføre den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope"> </xref> aktivitet.

trans-unit.source: The current native activity execution context.
Indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith*> property should be serialized.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith*>egenskapsverdi må være serialiserte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith*>
